column11: outlets are starting to become a fire hazard
column13: This property is about 10 minutes to the beach which is very convenient. The condo itself is dingy, dirty, and very outdated. The walls are scuffed up, outlets are starting to become a fire hazard, and there was hair in the tub from previous renters.

column7: oceanfront dog-friendly home with private beach access, amazing views, deck
column10: good location, needs to resolve some safety issues
column11: outlet behind bed missing electrical cover, safety hazard;
column13: 5 bedrooms, only 2 had tvs, neither worked, one working tv in whole house; light at outside stairway did not work, had to walk down steps in dark, safety hazard; outlet behind bed missing electrical cover, safety hazard; upper window in dining area came crashing down when unlocked, safety hazard; upstairs bedroom exterior door would not open, no egress from bedroom, safety hazard.

column11: Prises électriques au mur qui sortent (juste posées contre le mur) très DANGEREUX pour les enfants.
column13:
Bonjour,
Appartement qui aurait besoin d'un bon rafraichissement. Prises électriques au mur qui sortent (juste posées contre le mur) très DANGEREUX pour les enfants. Manquait un four à raclette, bols, etc. Beaucoup de perdition de chaleur par les fenêtres de la salle de bain.
